fields.description:
Working days in a month: Salary calculated based on actual working days (typically 22-26 days). Formula: (Monthly Salary ÷ Working Days) × Days Worked.
No. of days in a month: Salary calculated based on calendar days (28-31 days). Formula: (Monthly Salary ÷ Total Days) × Days Worked.
fields.label: Salary Calculation Based on
fields.options:
